documents.document: Don't let a bad day make you feel like you have a bad life.
Look at everything as though you were seeing it either for the first or last time. -Betty Smith
RT @FaithReeI: https://t.co/cZ1YrQZx7b
Talking about our problems is our greatest addiction. Break the habit. Talk about your joys.
Don't give up. https://t.co/dmI7xtZ4Pt
RT @TheDaiIyPuppy: I don't wanna wear the pink leash today :( https://t.co/0YBCyDou7i
When things aren't adding up in your life, start subtracting.
To the man who only has a hammer, everything he encounters begins to look like a nail. -Abraham Maslow
RT @FaithReeI: https://t.co/AEV9NxKeXd
When you get to the end of your rope, tie a knot & hang on. -Franklin D. Roosevelt
You've got this!! https://t.co/UDbi6thiwq
God gives his hardest battles to his strongest soldiers.
Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it. -Bill Cosby
Have faith, something great is waiting for you on the other side of FEAR. https://t.co/FLe9w6Uf1i
RT @coffee_lst: First things first. https://t.co/eDbt1u3qQn
Girls want a guy who say I love you every night and proves it every day.
There is beauty in simplicity.
I have faith that God is living out a divine plan through me. Have faith in God. - Mark 11:22
Live bold. https://t.co/abZGpcxU1K
When a goal matters enough to a person, that person will find a way to accomplish what at first seemed impossible. - Nido Qubein
RT @catscofffee: I don't care! https://t.co/dHixpAjGO9
You can't build a reputation on what you're going to do. -Henry Ford
Never get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life..
If you don't step forward you will always remain in the same place.
It is not what happens to you but how you respond to what happens to you.
Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
It's difficult to follow your dream. It's a tragedy not to.
Mediocrity will always try to drag excellence down to its level. Don't trade your superiority for their inferiority.

RT @Inspire_Us: Let your results speak for you!

Whatever you want to do, do it now. There are only so many tomorrows.
RT @LifeLimits: Happiness can be found in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
The purpose of life is to live a life of purpose.
RT @FaithReeI: https://t.co/n2SJtgJ5Z9
Deal with the world the way it is, not the way you wish it was. - John Chambers
Faith in God includes faith in His timing.
The tragedy in life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goal to reach. - Benjamin Mays
RT @TabithaKhaye: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
Giving up doesn't always mean you're weak. Sometimes it means you are strong and smart enough to let go and move on.
Happiness is in the heart, not in the circumstances. - Author Unknown
RT @FaithReeI: You will turn back to me & ask for help, & I will answer your prayers - Jer 29:12
Our experiences shape us. Appreciate them, for you wouldn't be the person you are without them. https://t.co/gLzSzZ4D5p
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
We all have difficult days, have faith. https://t.co/ezWl7dnZFM
There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
Quality means doing it right when no one is looking. - Henry Ford
A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
If your ship doesn't come in, swim out to it. - Jonathan Winters

For attractive lips, speak words of kindness. For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. -Audrey Hepburn
The worst thing about being lied to is simply knowing you weren't worth the truth.

Sometimes the wrong choices bring us to the right places.
Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye. - Helen Keller
Men are disturbed not by the things that happen, but by their opinion of the things that happen. - Epictetus
RT @desire_lnspire: The happiest people don't necessarily have the best of everything but they make the most of everything.
If you ever think about giving up, remember why you held on for so long. - Hayley Williams
Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion. - Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Fall seven times, stand up eight. https://t.co/tc4C2ml2ZF
Happiness cannot come from without. It must come from within. - Helen Keller
We lose ourselves in the things we love. We find ourselves there, too.
The strongest people aren't always the people who win, but the people who don't give up when they lose.
Be a blessing to someone today - Proverbs 11:25
It always seems impossible until its done. -Nelson Mandela
Don't go through life, grow through life. - Eric Butterworth
Train your mind to see the good in everything.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
RT @LifeLimits: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness. - Jonathan Safran Foer
Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
We could never learn to be brave & patient, if there were only joys in the world. -Helen Keller
Great advice!! https://t.co/2eXeWDr9Pi

The way we choose to see the world creates the world we see. - Barry Neil Kaufman
RT @Quote_Soup: I am who I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.
I am who I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill
Nothing you wear is more important than your smile. -Connie Stevens
Be so busy loving your life that you have no time for hate, regret or fear.
RT @Quote_Soup: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power. - Mary Pickford
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power. - Mary Pickford
Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
Look for the good in every moment. https://t.co/X35SjGhqCe
An honest answer is like a kiss on the lips. -Proverbs 24:26

Be strong & courageous. Do not be terrified or discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go. -Josh 1:9
RT @FamousWomen: Never give up hope, because you never know, it could still happen.
I don't measure a man's success by how high he climbs, but how high he bounces when he hits bottom. - George Patton
Losers quit when they're tired. Winners quit when they've won.
